snippet.title: Salvo Shuffle - Teaser Trailer 1 (Wishlist now on Steam)
snippet.description:
Salvo Shuffle is a turn-based bullet-hell roguelike with combat mechanics similar to Undertale. Enemies can only damage you by spawning individual bullet-hell attacks (aka. salvos).
Defeat the most challenging foe to make your life easier or keep them all alive for a massive combo and coin multiplier. The choice is yours!
The salvos might be simple on their own, but because you fight many enemies simultaneously, the actual bullet hell can vary drastically from fight to fight.

Wishlist this game on Steam now. The intended price is $0 with no other purchases (yes, it's completely free):
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2579550?utm_source=youtube

-------------------------------------------------------- 

Links: 

This game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2579550?utm_source=youtube

The game's official Discord Server: (currently very empty, please join :3)
https://discord.com/invite/J4mvAahm6J

My music on Newgrounds: 
https://agentjo.newgrounds.com/ 

My other games on Itch (mostly short Game Jam games): 
https://agent-jo.itch.io/ 
 
--------------------------------------------------------  

Chapters: 
0:00 Action Combat
0:24 Firework City
0:43 Outro
 
--------------------------------------------------------

Music used (in order):
Agent_Jo - Flight Evasion* (from "Salvo Shuffle")
Agent_Jo - Chaos Battle* (from "Salvo Shuffle")
*slightly altered for the video
